summary: Completed testing of Fast-track feature for meeting transcription processing. All backend API tests (10/10) PASSED. All frontend UI tests PASSED. Fast-track toggle, topic input, and pipeline selector all work correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted test project: TEST_FastTrack_UITest (id: 33b57333-f2cb-4dc6-82b9-ab3463d34a41)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Fast-track feature fully tested. The upload section now has a Fast-track toggle with data-testid='fast-track-toggle'. When enabled, it shows topic input (data-testid='fast-track-topic') and pipeline selector (data-testid='fast-track-pipeline-select'). Backend stores fast_track settings in project.fast_track field. The bulk-accept endpoint at POST /api/projects/{id}/fragments/bulk-accept works correctly to auto-accept all pending fragments. ProjectResponse model includes optional fast_track Dict field.

bulk_accept_endpoint.details: POST /api/projects/{id}/fragments/bulk-accept returns 200 with {accepted: int, total: int}

upload_with_fast_track_params.details: Upload endpoint accepts fast_track, fast_track_topic, fast_track_pipeline_id form fields

project_response_fast_track_field.details: ProjectResponse model includes optional fast_track Dict field

fast_track_toggle_ui.details: Fast-track toggle appears in upload section with data-testid='fast-track-toggle'

fast_track_topic_input.details: Topic input appears when fast-track enabled with data-testid='fast-track-topic'

pipeline_selector.details: Pipeline selector loads pipelines list with data-testid='fast-track-pipeline-select'. Shows multiple options including 'Стандартный анализ встречи'

fullanalysistab_props.details: Code review confirms FullAnalysisTab accepts autoRun, fastTrackPipelineId, fastTrackTopic props in ProjectPage.js line 341-347

frontend_tests.login: PASS - Login via landing page modal works
frontend_tests.navigation: PASS - Navigation to project page works
frontend_tests.fast_track_toggle: PASS - Toggle found and clicks correctly
frontend_tests.topic_input: PASS - Input appears and accepts text
frontend_tests.pipeline_selector: PASS - Selector loads options and allows selection
